CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Bowhead Specialty Holdings Inc. Common Stock

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bowhead Specialty is a profitable and growing company providing specialty Property and Casualty insurance products. We currently offer craft solutions to a wide variety of businesses across three underwriting divisions: Casualty, Professional Liability and Healthcare. Across our underwriting divisions, our policyholders vary in size, industry and complexity and require specialized, innovative and customized solutions where we individually underwrite and structure policies for each account. As a result, our products are primarily written on an E&S basis, where we have flexibility of rate and policy form. Our underwriting teams collaborate across our claims, actuarial and legal departments, ensuring they are aware of developments that could impact our business and using a consistent approach to our underwriting. We handle our claims in-house and distribute our products through carefully selected relationships with leading distribution partners in both the wholesale and retail markets.
